channel.title: CVE Feed for Brave Software -- Brave Browser Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brave Software -- Brave Browser Android

item.title: CVE-2023-28364|2023-06-30T23:20:12.719Z -- brave%20software -- brave%20browser%20android
item.description: An Open Redirect vulnerability exists prior to version 1.52.117, where the built-in QR scanner in Brave Browser Android navigated to scanned URLs automatically without showing the URL first. Now the user must manually navigate to the URL.
